name: turnest
description: 1D Cutting Stock Optimization for aluminum and steel profiles

scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm ci && cd ../backend && npm ci --only=production
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && mkdir -p ../backend/public && cp -r dist/* ../backend/public/
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"

author: ChosenOneDevv
